level.heading: Assistance with discovery.
level.text: A tribunal of the District may:
Request a tribunal of another state to assist in obtaining discovery; and
Upon request, compel a person over whom it has jurisdiction to respond to a discovery order issued by a tribunal of another state.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-81, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 46-301.01.

level.heading: Effective Dates
level.text: Applicability: Section 3 of D.C. Law 16-137 provides: "This act shall apply as of April 1, 2007."

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Former § 46-303.18 has been recodified as § 46-303.19 by D.C. Law 16-137, § 2(c)(19).

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon § 318 of the Uniform Interstate Family Support Act (2001 Act). See Volume 9, Part IB Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.
